title: Ajax to sack manager John Heitinga less than six months after Liverpool exit - BBC Sport
snippet: Assistant coach Fred Grim, 60, will manage Ajax on an interim basis. According to local media, Ajax are interested in hiring their former manager Erik ten Hag, who was sacked by Manchester United in October 2024 and lasted just two Bundesliga ...

title: John Heitinga appointed head coach of Ajax
snippet: Ajax has reached an agreement with Liverpool and John Heitinga regarding the coach’s move to Amsterdam. Marcel Keizer will be his assistant.

title: r/soccer on Reddit: [VI] Fred Grim will be Ajax first team head coach until at least the winter break

title: AFC Ajax - Wikipedia
snippet: They hired Francesco Farioli as new head coach, the first foreign coach since 1998. Under his leadership, Ajax reached the league phase of the Europa League, where it finished eleventh.
